Lemma subslet_app {cf:checker_flags} Î£ Î s s' Î Î' :
  subslet Î£ Î s (subst_context s' 0 Î) â
  subslet Î£ Î s' Î' â
  subslet Î£ Î (s ++ s') (Î' ,,, Î).
Proof.
induction Î in s, s', Î' |- *; simpl; auto; moveâ sub'.
- depelim sub'. auto.
- rewrite subst_context_snoc in sub' â sub''.
  move:(subslet_length sub') â /=.
  rewrite /snoc /= subst_context_length /= â Hlen.
  destruct a as [na [b|] ty].
  Ã depelim sub'; simpl in t0, Hlen.
    rewrite -subst_app_simpl' /=. lia.
    constructor. eauto.
    now rewrite - !subst_app_simpl' in t0; try lia.
  Ã rewrite /subst_decl /map_decl /snoc /= in sub'.
    depelim sub'; simpl in Hlen.
    rewrite - !subst_app_simpl' in t0; try lia.
    simpl; constructor; eauto.
Qed.

Lemma subslet_skipn {cf:checker_flags} Î£ Î s Î n :
  subslet Î£ Î s Î â

  - intros H; depelim H.
    Ã rewrite !skipn_nil. constructor.
    Ã rewrite !skipn_S. auto.
    Ã rewrite !skipn_S. auto.
Qed.

Lemma context_subst_app_inv {ctx ctx' : context} {args s : list term} :
  context_subst (subst_context (skipn #|ctx| s) 0 ctx)
    (skipn (context_assumptions ctx') args)
    (firstn #|ctx| s)
  Ã context_subst ctx' (firstn (context_assumptions ctx') args) (skipn #|ctx| s) â
  context_subst (ctx ++ ctx') args s.
Proof.
  moveâ [Hl Hr].
  rewrite -(firstn_skipn (context_assumptions ctx') args).
  assert (lenctx' : context_assumptions ctx' + context_assumptions ctx = #|args|).
  { assert (lenctx'' : context_assumptions ctx' â¤ #|args|).
    move: (context_subst_assumptions_length Hr).
    rewrite firstn_length; lia.
    move: (context_subst_assumptions_length Hr).
    move: (context_subst_assumptions_length Hl).
    rewrite firstn_length skipn_length; try lia.
    intros H1 H2. rewrite context_assumptions_subst in H1. lia. }
  move: args s ctx' lenctx' Hl Hr.
  induction ctx â args s ctx' lenctx' Hl Hr.
  - simpl in Ã. depelim Hl. rewrite H app_nil_r. now rewrite skipn_0 in Hr.
  - simpl in Ã. destruct s as [|u s];
    simpl in *; rewrite subst_context_snoc0 in Hl; depelim Hl.
    simpl in H. noconf H.
    Ã destruct a as [na [b|] ty]; simpl in *; noconf H.
      rewrite skipn_S in Hl, Hr. destruct args using rev_case. rewrite skipn_nil in H0.
      apply (f_equal (@length _)) in H0. simpl in H0. autorewrite with len in H0.
      simpl in H0; lia. rewrite H0.
      rewrite skipn_app in H0.
      rewrite app_length /= in lenctx'.
      specialize (IHctx args s ctx'). forward IHctx by lia.
      assert (context_assumptions ctx' - #|args| = 0) by lia.
      rewrite H skipn_0 in H0. apply app_inj_tail in H0 as [Ha xu]. subst x.
      rewrite -Ha.
      rewrite -Ha in Hl. specialize (IHctx Hl).
      rewrite firstn_app in Hr |- Ã.
      rewrite H [firstn _ [u]]firstn_0 // app_nil_r in Hr |- Ã.
      specialize (IHctx Hr). rewrite app_assoc.
      now econstructor.
    Ã rewrite skipn_S in Hl, Hr, H.
      destruct a as [na' [b'|] ty']; simpl in *; noconf H.
      pose proof (context_subst_length Hl). rewrite subst_context_length in H.
      rewrite {3}H -subst_app_simpl [firstn #|ctx| _ ++ _]firstn_skipn. constructor.
      apply IHctx â //.
Qed.

Lemma ctx_inst_inst {cf:checker_flags} Î£ ext u Î i Î :
  wf_global_ext Î£.1 ext â

    eapply (typing_subst_instance'' Î£); eauto.

Lemma spine_subst_inj_subst {cf:checker_flags} {Î£ Î inst s s' Î} :
  spine_subst Î£ Î inst s Î â
  spine_subst Î£ Î inst s' Î â
  s = s'.
Proof.
  intros [_ _ c _] [_ _ c' _].
  induction c in s', c' |- *; depelim c'; simpl; auto.
  apply app_inj_tail in H as [-> ->].
  f_equal; eauto.
  specialize (IHc _ c'). now subst.
Qed.

Lemma make_context_subst_skipn {Î args s s'} :
  make_context_subst Î args s = Some s' â
  skipn #|Î| s' = s.
Proof.
  induction Î in args, s, s' |- Ã.
  - destruct args; simpl; auto.
    + now intros [= ->].
    + now discriminate.
  - destruct a as [na [b|] ty]; simpl.
    + intros H.
      specialize (IHÎ _ _ _ H).
      now eapply skipn_n_Sn.
    + destruct args; try discriminate.
      intros Hsub.
      specialize (IHÎ _ _ _ Hsub).
      now eapply skipn_n_Sn.
Qed.

Inductive arity_spine {cf : checker_flags} (Î£ : global_env_ext) (Î : context) :
  term â list term â term â Type :=
| arity_spine_nil ty : arity_spine Î£ Î ty [] ty
| arity_spine_conv ty ty' : isType Î£ Î ty' â
  Î£ ;;; Î â¢ ty â¤ ty' â arity_spine Î£ Î ty [] ty'
| arity_spine_def : â (tl : list term)
                      (na : aname) (A a B B' : term),
                    arity_spine Î£ Î (B {0 := a}) tl B' â
                    arity_spine Î£ Î (tLetIn na a A B) tl B'
| arity_spine_ass : â (hd : term) (tl : list term)
                      (na : aname) (A B B' : term),
                    Î£;;; Î |- hd : A â
                    arity_spine Î£ Î (B {0 := hd}) tl B' â
                    arity_spine Î£ Î (tProd na A B) (hd :: tl) B'.

Lemma context_subst_subst Î inst0 s Î inst s' :
  context_subst Î inst0 s â
  context_subst (subst_context s 0 Î) inst s' â
  context_subst (Î ,,, Î) (inst0 ++ inst) (s' ++ s).

+ intros HÎ Hi. depelim Hi.
  now rewrite app_nil_r.
+ intros H' Hsub.
  rewrite subst_context_snoc0 in Hsub.
  destruct a as [na [b|] ty];
  depelim Hsub.
  - specialize (IHÎ _ _ H' Hsub).
    assert(#|Î| = #|s0|) as â.
    { apply context_subst_length in Hsub.
      now rewrite subst_context_length in Hsub. }
    rewrite -(subst_app_simpl s0 s 0 b).
    simpl. now constructor.
  - specialize (IHÎ _ _ H' Hsub).
    assert(#|Î| = #|s0|).
    { apply context_subst_length in Hsub.
      now rewrite subst_context_length in Hsub. }
    rewrite app_assoc /=. now constructor.
Qed.

  Lemma subst_type_local_ctx {Î Î' Î Î' s ctxs} :

  Lemma arity_typing_spine {Î Î' s inst s'} :
    typing_spine Î£ Î (it_mkProd_or_LetIn Î' (tSort s)) inst (tSort s') â
    [Ã (#|inst| = context_assumptions Î'), leq_universe (global_ext_constraints Î£) s s' &
      â instsubst, spine_subst Î£ Î inst instsubst Î'].
  Proof using wfÎ£.
    revert s inst s'.
    (* assert (wf_local Î£ Î). now apply wf_local_app_l in wfÎ'. move X after wfÎ'.
    rename X into wfÎ. *)
    generalize (le_n #|Î'|).
    generalize (#|Î'|) at 2.
    induction n in Î' |- Ã.
    - destruct Î' using rev_ind; try clear IHÎ'; simpl; intros len s inst s' Hsp.
      + dependent elimination Hsp as [spnil _ _ cum|spcons isty isty' cum tyhd sp].
        ++ split=>//.
          now eapply ws_cumul_pb_Sort_inv in cum.
          â []. split; try constructor; eauto with pcuic.
          all:now eapply isType_wf_local.
        ++ now eapply ws_cumul_pb_Sort_Prod_inv in cum.
      + rewrite app_length /= in len; elimtype False; lia.
    - intros len s inst s' Hsp.

  Lemma typing_spine_it_mkProd_or_LetIn_gen {Î Î Î' : context} {T args s s' args' T'} :
    make_context_subst (List.rev Î) args s' = Some s â
    typing_spine Î£ Î (subst0 s T) args' T' â
    #|args| = context_assumptions Î â
    subslet Î£ Î s (Î' ,,, Î) â
    isType Î£ Î (subst0 s' (it_mkProd_or_LetIn Î T)) â
    typing_spine Î£ Î (subst0 s' (it_mkProd_or_LetIn Î T)) (args ++ args') T'.
  Proof using wfÎ£.
    generalize (le_n #|Î|).
    generalize (#|Î|) at 2.
    induction n in Î, Î', args, s, s', T |- Ã.
    - destruct Î using rev_ind.
      + intros le Hsub Hsp.
        destruct args; simpl; try discriminate.
        simpl in Hsub. now depelim Hsub.
      + rewrite app_length /=; intros; elimtype False; lia.
    - destruct Î using rev_ind.
      1:intros le Hsub Hsp; destruct args; simpl; try discriminate;
      simpl in Hsub; now depelim Hsub.
      clear IHÎ.
      rewrite app_length /=; intros Hlen Hsub Hsp Hargs.
      rewrite context_assumptions_app in Hargs.
      destruct x as [na [b|] ty]; simpl in Ã.
      Ã rewrite it_mkProd_or_LetIn_app /= /mkProd_or_LetIn /=.
        rewrite Nat.add_0_r in Hargs.
        rewrite rev_app_distr in Hsub. simpl in Hsub.
        intros subs isty. rewrite app_context_assoc in subs.
        specialize (IHn l _ T args s _ ltac:(lia) Hsub Hsp Hargs subs).
        forward IHn.
        { eapply isType_tLetIn_red in isty; pcuic.
          move: isty. rewrite /subst1 -subst_app_simpl //. }
        eapply typing_spine_letin; auto.
        rewrite /subst1.
        now rewrite -subst_app_simpl.
      Ã rewrite it_mkProd_or_LetIn_app /= /mkProd_or_LetIn /=.
        rewrite rev_app_distr in Hsub.

        simpl in Hargs. rewrite Nat.add_1_r in Hargs. noconf Hargs.
        intros subs. rewrite app_context_assoc in subs.
        specialize (IHn l _ T args s _ ltac:(lia) Hsub Hsp H subs).
        intros Har.
        eapply subslet_app_inv in subs as [subsl subsr].
        depelim subsl.

        rewrite List.rev_length in Hskip. rewrite Hskip in H0; noconf H0.
        forward IHn.
        { eapply isType_apply in Har; tea.
          now move: Har; rewrite /subst1 -subst_app_simpl. }
        simpl; eapply typing_spine_prod; auto; first
        now rewrite /subst1 -subst_app_simpl.
  Qed.

  Lemma typing_spine_it_mkProd_or_LetIn {Î Î T args s args' T'} :

  Lemma spine_subst_conv {Î inst insts Î inst' insts' Î'} :

  Lemma ctx_inst_length {Î args Î} :
    ctx_inst Î£ Î args Î â

  Lemma ctx_inst_subst {Î Î0 Î' i Î sub} :
    ctx_inst Î£ (Î ,,, Î0 ,,, Î') i Î â
    subslet Î£ Î sub Î0 â

Fixpoint all_rels (Î : context) (n : nat) (k : nat) :=
  match Î with
  | nil â nil

    | None â tRel n :: all_rels vs (S n) k
    end
  end.

Lemma all_rels_lift (Î : context) n : all_rels Î n (n + #|Î|) = map (lift0 n) (all_rels Î 0 #|Î|).

  f_equal.
  specialize (IHc n (S n')).

  specialize (IHc n (S n')).
  now rewrite -IHc.
  simpl.
  f_equal.
  specialize (IHc n (S n')).
  now rewrite -IHc.

  Lemma subslet_cumul {pb Î args Î Î'} :
    assumption_context Î â assumption_context Î' â
    wf_local Î£ (Î ,,, Î) â

    - intros subsl; depelim subsl.
      2:{ elimtype False; inv ass. }

      forward IHa by now depelim ass.
      forward IHa by now depelim ass'.
      depelim wf.
      depelim wf'.
      2:{ elimtype False; inv ass'. }

  Qed.
